artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Mill: Bloomcraft; Charles Bloom, Inc.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Print on plain weave cotton, silk screened with faux block print texture. Multicolored vertical stripes 1/2 to 1 inches wide. Horizontal pattern repeat 22.25 inches. Vertical pattern repeat 25.25 inches. Scotchguarded. (Red, orange, lavendar, green, olive)

title: Rhythm
